Actions.Name: ReplaceMethodAndParameters

Value.comment: Invoke being the function you wanted to call in your lambda function.

VbValue.comment: Add lambda function as UseOwin method parameter

RecommendedActions.Description: Replace UseWebApi with UseEndpoints and add a comment to create a configure services method. Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder, Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection namespaces and remove System.Web.Http namespace.

Actions.Name: AddComment

Value.comment: Please add a new ConfigureServices method: public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) { services.AddControllers(); }

VbValue.comment: Please add a new ConfigureServices method: ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services). Add lambda function as UseEndPoints parameter: Function (endpoints) endpoints.MapControllers() End Function

Actions.Description: Add a comment on adding a new configureservices method.

ActionValidation.Contains: Please add a new ConfigureServices method: public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) { services.AddControllers(); }

VbActionValidation.Contains: Please add a new ConfigureServices method: ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services). Add lambda function as UseEndPoints parameter: Function (endpoints) endpoints.MapControllers() End Function

Imports Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection

RecommendedActions.Description: Add a comment to explain how to replace CreatePerOwinContext<T>(System.Func<T>) with a service in ConfigureServices method.

Actions.Name: AddComment

Value.comment: Please replace CreatePerOwinContext<T>(System.Func<T>) and add a new ConfigureServices method: public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) { Register your service here instead of using CreatePerOwinContext }. For example, app.CreatePerOwinContext(ApplicationDbContext.Create); would become: services.AddDbContext<ApplicationDbContext>(options => options.UseSqlServer(config.GetConnectionString("DefaultConnection")));

VbValue.comment: Please replace CreatePerOwinContext(Of T)>(System.Func(Of T)) and add a new ConfigureServices method: ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services). For example, app.CreatePerOwinContext(ApplicationDbContext.Create) would become: services.AddDbContext(Of ApplicationDbContext)(Function(options) options.UseSqlServer(config.GetConnectionString("DefaultConnection")) EndFunction)

VbActionValidation.Contains: Please replace CreatePerOwinContext(Of T)>(System.Func(Of T)) and add a new ConfigureServices method: ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services).

RecommendedActions.Description: For .Net 6, add latest Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google package version and add a comment to explain how to add google authentication.

Actions.Name: AddComment

Value.comment: Please add IApplicationBuilder.UseAuthentication() in your configure method. Within your public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) method please add services.AddAuthentication().AddGoogle(options => { IConfigurationSection googleAuthNSection = Configuration.GetSection("Authentication:Google"); options.ClientId = googleAuthNSection["ClientId"]; options.ClientSecret = googleAuthNSection["ClientSecret"]; } );

VbValue.comment: Please add IApplicationBuilder.UseAuthentication() in your configure method. Within your public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) method please add services.AddAuthentication().AddGoogle()
